name: Auto Care Association
bossPosition: Senior Vice President, Regulatory and Government Affairs
membership: Auto Care is comprised of manufacturers, distributors, retailers and installers of automotive components and chemicals.  For additional information www.autocare.org
goal: To represent the interests of the independent repair aftermarket in the United States and globally.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Environment, Transport
euInitiatives:
Access to in-vehicle data
REACH
End of life vehicle management
GDPR
Access to vehicle repair and maintenance information
